    OPS 2.0


    Bring Open Project Space to Your Campus Today!

    How to Sign Up Projects

    iPoduino

    Think you’ve got what it takes to be the next Steve Jobs? Well, let’s take it one step at a time– learn about Arduino, PWM, and working with speakers by making an iPoduino.

    Explore

    Distance Sensor

    How does motion detection work anyway? Learn how to use Infrared Sensors, transistors, and some nifty Arduino functions by building a Distance Sensor!

    Explore

    Red Light, Green Light

    Team up with a friend and compete for a high score! Learn about UART communication, button debouncing, and flex those coding skills by making a stoplight simulator game!
